website_summaries.verdict: An inexpensive choice for someone who might like to try a personal steam inhaler.
pros: Designed to help unclog sinuses and relieve congestion
Users can add eucalyptus oil (just a few drops) for tough congestion
cons: Some complaints of an ill-fitting mask
The unit does not heat the water

customer_reviews.title: cheap material
customer_reviews.text: Steam is too hot, because its too close distance from nose to water. So its not so useful steam inhaler
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Happy to find this. My daughter was sick great price for the money!!!
customer_reviews.author: Darryl smith

customer_reviews.title: Too small and ineffective
customer_reviews.text: Too small and ineffective. I dont really get any steam from this.
customer_reviews.author: Anjana Srivastava

customer_reviews.title: Helpful
customer_reviews.text: This is great to test with and see if heat steam is really what helps you. So many personal inhaler's are claiming to offer heat steam, but they really don't. Your arms will get tired of holding it though.
customer_reviews.author: BH

customer_reviews.title: The plastic mask doesn't fit my face and it is ...
customer_reviews.text: The plastic mask doesn't fit my face and it is uncomfortable, don't waist your money. I wouldn't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: jbd

customer_reviews.title: Looked so cheap and never used it.
customer_reviews.text: Looked so cheap and never used it. I don't even know where I put it...
customer_reviews.author: Ayako

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: This may work fine for some, but didn't work for me. Too small for my purpose.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lyders

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not at all what I expecgted. Very cheaply made...even bendable! My advice is don't purchase this item.
customer_reviews.author: Alice M Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: fantastic product, for pets too!!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product--- off label use------- do cat rescue, works beautifully for steaming cats with upper respiratory infections (much easier and more successful than the standard sink or shower options).
customer_reviews.author: leslie1492

customer_reviews.title: This apparatus works! Do not bother spending more than ...
customer_reviews.text: This apparatus works! Do not bother spending more than you need to on other more expensive gadgets.
customer_reviews.author: Oehme

product_meta.title: Personal Steam Inhaler - Personal Steam Inhaler Set
